resources.string: Sajag is a disaster alert application that provides real-time weather updates, allows citizens to report disasters in their area, and offers a platform for disaster communication and preparedness.
Sajag App is free to download and use for anyone concerned about disaster preparedness and communication.
Marg Darshika offers vital safety guidelines for different disasters, covering cyclones, floods, earthquakes, cold waves, heat waves, avalanches, thunderstorms, and more

Most features require an internet connection to access real-time data and communicate with others. However, you might be able to view previously downloaded content from the "View" section even without an internet connection (depending on app functionality).
The app\'s View section displays images and information about reported disasters happening in your area.

Note : 
1.We value your thoughts! Your feedback helps us improve. 
2.Whether it's a suggestion, a bug report, or just a shoutout, we're all ears! Share your thoughts with us and together, let's make this app even better. 
 3.Thank you for being a part of our journey!
